LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
AnnualClinicalResponseQuestionnairehttps://connect.ichom.org/fhir/Questionnaire/ClinicalResponseAnnualUpdate#0.0.1
General-Information-ClinicalGeneral information1..1group
N/A-ClinicalWhat is the patient's medical record number?1..1integer
LastName-ClinicalWhat is the patient's last name?1..1string
Treatment-VariablesTreatment Variables1..1group
TREATMENT_BREASTPlease indicate whether the patient received one of the following treatment during the last year: (select all that apply)1..*choiceValue Set: Type of treatments
SURGERY_BREASTPlease indicate the type of surgery the patient received during the last year:1..1choiceEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Surgical procedure (procedure) (SNOMED CT#387713003)
Value Set: Types of breast surgery
SurgeryDateKnownIs the date of surgery known?1..1booleanEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Surgical procedure (procedure) (SNOMED CT#387713003)
SurgeryDateProvide the date of surgery:1..1dateEnable When: SurgeryDateKnown = true
SURGERYAXPlease indicate the type of surgery to the axilla the patient received during the last year:1..1choiceEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Operative procedure on axilla (SNOMED CT#699455008)
Options: 4 options
SURGERYAXDATE-KnownIs the date of surgery to the axilla known?1..1booleanEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Operative procedure on axilla (SNOMED CT#699455008)
SURGERYAXDATEPlease provide the date of surgery to the axilla:1..1dateEnable When: SURGERYAXDATE-Known = true
SURGERYAX2Please indicate whether the patient received axillary clearance due to lymph node involvement after sentinel lymph node biopsy during the last year:1..1choiceEnable When:
  • SURGERYAX = 0 (unknown#0)
  • SURGERYAX = 1 (unknown#1)

Options: 3 options
SURGERYAX2DATE-KnownIs the date of axillary clearance known?1..1booleanEnable When: SURGERYAX2 = 1 (unknown#1)
SURGERYAX2DATEPlease provide the date of axillary clearance:1..1dateEnable When: SURGERYAX2DATE-Known = true
RECONSTRUCTPlease indicate the type of delayed reconstruction the patient received during the last year:1..1choiceEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Mammoplasty (SNOMED CT#33496007)
Options: 4 options
RECONSTRUCTDATE-KnownIs the date of the delayed reconstruction known?1..1booleanEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Mammoplasty (SNOMED CT#33496007)
RECONSTRUCTDATEPlease provide the date of delayed reconstruction:1..1dateEnable When: RECONSTRUCTDATE-Known = true
RADIOTX_BREASTPlease indicate the intent of radiotherapy:1..*choiceEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Radiation oncology AND/OR radiotherapy (SNOMED CT#108290001)
Options: 3 options
RADIOTXTYPE_BREASTPlease indicate location/type of radiotherapy:1..1choiceEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Radiation oncology AND/OR radiotherapy (SNOMED CT#108290001)
Options: 11 options
RadioTxStartDate-KnownIs the start date of radiotherapy known?1..1booleanEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Radiation oncology AND/OR radiotherapy (SNOMED CT#108290001)
RadioTxStartDatePlease provide the start date of radiotherapy:1..1dateEnable When: RadioTxStartDate-Known = true
RadioTxStopDate-KnownIs the stop date of radiotherapy known?1..1booleanEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Radiation oncology AND/OR radiotherapy (SNOMED CT#108290001)
RadioTxStopDatePlease provide the stop date of radiotherapy:1..1dateEnable When: RadioTxStopDate-Known = true
CHEMOTXINTENTPlease indicate the intent of chemotherapy:1..1choiceEnable When:
  • TREATMENT_BREAST = Adjuvant chemotherapy (Treatment variables#A_chemo)
  • TREATMENT_BREAST = Neoadjuvant chemotherapy (Treatment variables#N_A_chemo)

Options: 3 options
CHEMOTXTYPE_BREASTPlease indicate the type of chemotherapy (select all that apply):1..*choiceEnable When:
  • TREATMENT_BREAST = Adjuvant chemotherapy (Treatment variables#A_chemo)
  • TREATMENT_BREAST = Neoadjuvant chemotherapy (Treatment variables#N_A_chemo)

Options: 5 options
ChemoTxStartDate-KnownIs the start date of chemotherapy known?1..1booleanEnable When:
  • TREATMENT_BREAST = Adjuvant chemotherapy (Treatment variables#A_chemo)
  • TREATMENT_BREAST = Neoadjuvant chemotherapy (Treatment variables#N_A_chemo)
ChemoTxStartDatePlease provide the start date of chemotherapy:1..1dateEnable When: ChemoTxStartDate-Known = true
ChemoTxStopdate-KnownIs the stop date of chemotherapy known?1..1booleanEnable When:
  • TREATMENT_BREAST = Adjuvant chemotherapy (Treatment variables#A_chemo)
  • TREATMENT_BREAST = Neoadjuvant chemotherapy (Treatment variables#N_A_chemo)
ChemoTxStopdatePlease provide the stop date of chemotherapy:1..1dateEnable When: ChemoTxStopdate-Known = true
HORMONTX_BREASTPlease indicate the intent of hormonal therapy:1..1choiceEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Hormone therapy (SNOMED CT#169413002)
Options: 3 options
HORMONTXTYPEPlease indicate the type of hormonal therapy (select all that apply):1..*choiceEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Hormone therapy (SNOMED CT#169413002)
Options: 6 options
HORMONTXSTARTDATE-KnownIs the start date of hormonal therapy known?1..1booleanEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Hormone therapy (SNOMED CT#169413002)
HORMONTXSTARTDATEPlease provide the start date of hormonal therapy:1..1dateEnable When: HORMONTXSTARTDATE-Known = true
HORMONTXSTOPDATE-KnownIs the stop date of hormonal therapy known?1..1booleanEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Hormone therapy (SNOMED CT#169413002)
HORMONTXSTOPDATEPlease provide the stop date of hormonal therapy, if applicable:1..1dateEnable When: HORMONTXSTOPDATE-Known = true
TARGETTX_BREASTPlease indicate the type of targeted therapy:1..1choiceEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Targeted therapy (Treatment variables#Targ_Thrpy)
Options: 3 options
TargetTxStartDate-KnownIs the start date of targeted therapy known?1..1booleanEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Targeted therapy (Treatment variables#Targ_Thrpy)
TargetTxStartDatePlease provide the start date of targeted therapy:1..1dateEnable When: TargetTxStartDate-Known = true
TargetTxStopDate-KnownIs the stop date of targeted therapy known?1..1booleanEnable When: TREATMENT_BREAST = Targeted therapy (Treatment variables#Targ_Thrpy)
TargetTxStopDatePlease provide the stop date of targeted therapy:1..1dateEnable When: TargetTxStopDate-Known = true
SURGERYPATIENTPlease indicate if the patient has had one of the following re-operations since their surgery for breast cancer (select all that apply):1..*choiceOptions: 5 options
SURGERYDATEPATIENT-KnownIs the date of the reoperation known?1..1booleanEnable When:
  • SURGERYPATIENT != 0 (unknown#0)
  • SURGERYPATIENT != 999 (unknown#999)
SURGERYDATEPATIENTWhen was the reoperation?1..1dateEnable When: SURGERYDATEPATIENT-Known = true
SYSTPATIENTIs the patient currently receiving systemic (ie drug) treatment for breast cancer?1..*choiceOptions: 6 options
SYSTDATEPATIENT-KnownIs the stop date of the systemic treatment known?1..1booleanEnable When: SYSTPATIENT = 1 (unknown#1)
SYSTDATEPATIENTWhen did the systemic treatment stop?1..1dateEnable When: SYSTDATEPATIENT-Known = true
Survival-and-Disease-controlSurvival and disease control1..1group
Survival-Q0Was the intent of the treatment curative?1..1boolean
MalignancyRecurIs there evidence of local, regional or distant recurrence of neoplasm? (In case of multiple recurrences, please report the most severe)0..1choiceEnable When: Survival-Q0 = true
Options: 5 options
RecurMethodWhat was the method of confirming recurrence of neoplasm?0..1choiceEnable When:
  • MalignancyRecur = 1 (unknown#1)
  • MalignancyRecur = 2 (unknown#2)
  • MalignancyRecur = 3 (unknown#3)

Options: 4 options
RecurDateCancer-KnownIs the date of cancer recurrence known?1..1booleanEnable When:
  • MalignancyRecur = 1 (unknown#1)
  • MalignancyRecur = 2 (unknown#2)
  • MalignancyRecur = 3 (unknown#3)
RecurDateCancerWhat is the date of cancer recurrence?0..1dateEnable When: RecurDateCancer-Known = true
VitalStatusHas the patient deceased?1..1boolean
DeceasedDate-KnownIs the date of death of the patient known?1..1booleanEnable When: VitalStatus = true
DeceasedDateWhat was the date of death of the patient?0..1dateEnable When: DeceasedDate-Known = true
DEATHBCIs the death attributable to breast cancer?0..1booleanEnable When: VitalStatus = true
